overview: Suburbia interrupted! Paul and Amy are a typical married couple raising a rebellious millennial daughter confused about her sexuality. When Paul gets demoted from his high paying job, panic ensues and Amy decides she needs to get a job to help out. After discovering that the mother of her daughter's lesbian girlfriend is a sex worker, Amy jumps in with both feet to save the family.
tagline: From tophy wife to working girl.
title: Making Ends Meet
